title: Stuck in a Ghost Game
body: Saw many reports for this issue yesterday, don't see any today, so thought I would just throw out there that the problem IS persisting. Thanks and please fix soon! ^.^

replies.body: I have the same problem .-. I know you guys are on it, but I wanted to report it in case more reports are helpful :)
Could be a spike of Ghost Games based on the influx of reports here.  I've let interested parties know, and it's being looked into now.  I'll offer more info as it comes!
